node_types.label: NetworkNode
node_types.description: Represents a physical or logical entity within the network, such as a cell site, base station, or user equipment.

node_types.label: ProtocolMessage
node_types.description: A message exchanged between network entities, carrying information about network operations.

node_types.label: Timer
node_types.description: A time-based event that triggers a specific action or state transition.

node_types.label: Procedure
node_types.description: A sequence of steps or actions that define a specific network operation.

node_types.label: UserState
node_types.description: The current state of a user or device within the network.

node_types.label: MessageSegmentContainer
node_types.description: Container holding the segments of a protocol message.

node_types.label: ConfiguredGrantConfigIndexMAC
node_types.description: Information element used to indicate the unique Configured Grant configurations index per MAC entity.

node_types.label: AIMLParameters
node_types.description: Information element containing capabilities for AI/ML-based beam management and CSI prediction.

node_types.label: ENUMERATED
node_types.description: Enumeration type representing a set of values.

node_types.label: Supported
node_types.description: Indicates whether a capability is supported.

node_types.label: BWPConfiguration
node_types.description: Configuration for BWP (Base Station Working Point)
